description: Analyzes submitted claim documents and details against fraud indicators, produces fraud probability score and detailed analysis

example_response.claim_summary: Brief summary of the claim analyzed
example_response.document_analysis: Analysis of document authenticity and completeness
example_response.fraud_indicators: JSON string array of all fraud indicators checked with their status
example_response.red_flags: JSON string array of identified red flags
example_response.recommended_actions: Recommended next steps based on fraud analysis
example_response.overall_assessment: Comprehensive narrative assessment of fraud risk
